text.section:
The name of a limited liability partnership must include:
The words "limited liability partnership";
"L.L.P."; or
"LLP".

The name of a limited partnership must include:
The words "limited partnership";
"L.P."; or
"LP".

The name of a limited liability limited partnership must include:
The words "limited liability limited partnership";
"L.L.L.P."; or
"LLLP".

section.section:
A professional corporation need not use any word specified under paragraph (1) of this subsection if:
The corporation has registered the name to be used in the manner provided in § 1-406 of this title; and
The name is the same as its corporate name except for the allowable omissions.
